<span className="text-sm font-semibold text-zinc-900 dark:text-white uppercase tracking-wider flex items-center gap-2 mb-0">
WHAT is this?
</span>

<span className="ml-2 font-bold">Grace</span> is a clean and versatile documentation template suitable for all types of projects. It features Markdown support, articles, SEO-friendly structure, and more. Easily customizable with various themes and visuals.


<WhatIncluded templateName="grace" />
